title: Strawberry Spring’s Lee Metzger on Moving Stephen King’s Prose Into Stereo
itunes:title: Strawberry Spring’s Lee Metzger on Moving Stephen King’s Prose Into Stereo
itunes:subtitle: Writer and producer Lee Metzger joins the Losers to discuss Strawberry Spring, his new, star-studded audio drama adaptation of Stephen King’s chilling Night Shift short story. In this jovial chat, Lee elaborates on how he stretched King's prose in...
description:
Writer and producer Lee Metzger joins the Losers to discuss Strawberry Spring, his new, star-studded audio drama adaptation of Stephen King’s chilling Night Shift short story. In this jovial chat, Lee elaborates on how he stretched King's prose into an eight-episode podcast and managed to put together its incredible cast: Garrett Hedlund, Milo Ventimiglia, Sydney Sweeney, Ken Marino, to name a few. Check out the spoiler-free interview and then dive into the audio drama shortly after. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
